data.message: LOL thats BS FACEBOOK gives out information such as personal information to businesses and commonly through applications such as Farmville. thats why IMHO the only way to bypass this is to make another facebook account specifically for apps and sign up stuff. and keep all personal information on the personal account off except an email address ( email address in the worst case can be fixed or deleted especially through a paid IP ) (that means phone numbers and any too personal info.
